item.title: Docker搭建Jupyter服务
item.author: xxxx
item.description: 一、运行容器 1 docker run -itd --name=jupyter -v /userdatas/Sandisk/Jupyter:/home/jovyan -p 10000:8888 --restart=unless-stopped jupyter/minimal-notebook:latest 映射目录到宿主机：/userdatas/Sandisk/Jupyter 此容器的更多运行参数：https:/
